prompt: Give me the clients that have bought 'Genen Shouyu'
query:
SELECT [dbo].[Customer].[FirstName], [dbo].[Customer].[LastName]
FROM [dbo].[Customer]
INNER JOIN [dbo].[Order] ON [dbo].[Customer].[Id] = [dbo].[Order].[CustomerId]
INNER JOIN [dbo].[OrderItem] ON [dbo].[Order].[Id] = [dbo].[OrderItem].[OrderId]
INNER JOIN [dbo].[Product] ON [dbo].[OrderItem].[ProductId] = [dbo].[Product].[Id]
WHERE [dbo].[Product].[ProductName] LIKE 'Genen Shouyu'
